quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Carmen
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, phrase, carmens. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the special power of agent Juarez from the 3-D action comedy G-Force?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Martial arts

questions.question: Who voices the main computer on the Axiom in the movie WALL-E?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sigourney Weaver

questions.question: What advice do the three mice from the pet shop in G-Force give to Blaster when a boy takes him from his cage?

options.text: Poop on his hand! Poop on his hand!
Spit on his hand! Spit on his hand!
Kiss him on the lips! Kiss him on the lips!
Bite his hand! Bite his hand!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Poop on his hand! Poop on his hand!

questions.question: What is the name of Mekhi Phifers character in the movie Carmen: A Hip Hopera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Derek

questions.question: What phrase is Blaster from the G-Force 2009 comedy movie famous for?

options.text: Im a genius! I love you, mom!
Im hungry... Are you gonna eat that?
Im pretty sure this is animal cruelty... But I love it!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im pretty sure this is animal cruelty... But I love it!

questions.question: Who kills Carmen Brown in Carmen: A Hip Hopera?

options.text: She dies in a car crash

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lieutenant Miller

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aspiring actress

questions.question: Who plays the role of the narrator in the 2001 movie Carmen: A Hip Hopera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Da Brat

questions.question: What scary thing happens to Carmen when she gets out of the bathtub in Carmen: A Hip Hopera?

options.text: She receives a threatening phone call
A stereo falls into the bathtub
She slips and hits her head
She sees blood on the floor

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A stereo falls into the bathtub

questions.question: What female rapper plays one of Carmens best friends in the movie Carmen: A Hip Hopera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rah Digga

questions.question: Which of these artists appears in the  Carmen: A Hip Hopera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bow Wow

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Spot

questions.question: In Carmen: A Hip Hopera , what do the tarot cards of the fortune teller read for Carmen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Death

questions.question: What does WALL-E use to escape the cell in Diagnostics?

options.text: Nothing. He escapes with the other robots during a power failure.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laser beam
